text: Sidaas waa Naxariista Ilaahay darteed inaad ula dhaqanto si nugul, oo haddaad ahaan laheyd mid qallafsan, qalbi adag, waxay xaqiiq ka kala yaaci lahaayeen hareerahaaga; ee iska cafi oo u dambi dhaaf dalab oo kala tasho arrinka, ee marka aad goosato arrin isku hallee Allaah, hubaal Allaah wuu jecel yahay kuwa isku halleeya
